price: 26. En hoeveel engelen zijn er in de hemel, wiens voorspraak niets zal baten behalve met Allah's toestemming, voor degenen die Hij wil.
arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wakam min malakin fī al-samāwāti lā tugh'nī shafāʿatuhum shayan illā min baʿdi an yadhana al-lahu liman yashāu wayarḍā
